content:
[Stewart Lee's Comedy Vehicle series 3 begins on BBC2 on 1st March](http://www.stewartlee.co.uk/latestnews.php)

And just as exciting is the news that Chris Morris will be appearing as the interviewer. He did a charming off-the-cuff intro for Stewart at last week's Royal Festival Hall show and I was hoping he might be involved in the TV series. A perfect replacement for Armando Iannucci. 

Update: The Guardian (or at least the headline-writer) goes so far as to say that the Chris Morris "[comeback starts here](http://www.theguardian.com/stage/2014/feb/20/chris-morris-comeback-stewart-lee-comedy-vehicle)".
